ingredients.item: 2 medium Waitrose British Blacktail free range eggs, beaten
100g Duchy Originals from Waitrose organic stoneground wholemeal

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Line a 23 x 32cm baking tin with baking parchment.
Mix together the bananas and yogurt, then stir in the eggs and honey until well blended.
Add the dates, wheatgerm, flour, baking powder and rolled oats and stir together well. Fold in the sunflower seeds and chopped chocolate.
Spread the mixture into the prepared tin and bake for 25 minutes until nicely browned and cooked through. Cut in half lengthways, then cut into bars. Leave to cool completely on a wire rack.
